name: (Pulse)³
description:
Set out for a mini metroidvania adventure like never before! Eradicate the surrounding darkness in. Use your shockwave attack with the beat of background music. Watch out for enemies and other risks in game's twisted labirynth. The lights pulsate with the rhythm - will you be able to see the incoming hazards? Or will the glowing eyes of the enemies consume you? Reveal all the labityhnth's mysteries and do not let yourself get consumed by the darkness!

Basic controls:

  • ←/→ - moving
  • Space bar - jumping
  • Z - flip the switch (if available)
  • X - shockwave attack (if available)
  • R - move to last checkpoint (in a horrible way)
  • Escape - quit the game
